verses.verse: אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <WH1697> These [be] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> which Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto all Israel בְּעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan בַּמִּדְבָּ֡ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בָּֽעֲרָבָה֩ <WH6160> in the plain מ֨וֹל <WH4136> over against ס֜וּף <WH5489> the Red בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between פָּארָ֧ן <WH6290> [sea] between Paran וּבֵֽין־ <WH996> between תֹּ֛פֶל <WH8603> and Tophel וְלָבָ֥ן <WH3837> and Laban וַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <WH2698> and Hazeroth וְדִ֥י זָהָֽב׃ <WH1774> and Dizahab

אַחַ֨ד <WH259> a עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days' מֵֽחֹרֵ֔ב <WH2722> [journey] from Horeb דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַר־ <WH2022> of mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> Seir עַ֖ד <WH5704> against קָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> to Kadesh-barnea

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become בְּאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> And it came to pass in the fortieth שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> [that] Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> had given him in commandment יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> according unto all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> After הַכֹּת֗וֹ <WH5221> he had slain אֵ֚ת <WH853> סִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> ע֚וֹג <WH5747> and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> of Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> which dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּרֹ֖ת <WH6252> at Astaroth בְּאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> in Edrei

בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> On this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab הוֹאִ֣יל <WH2974> began מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses בֵּאֵ֛ר <WH874> to declare אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> this law הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <WH413> to us בְּחֹרֵ֣ב <WH2722> unto us in Horeb לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying רַב־ <WH7227> long enough לָכֶ֥ם שֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> Ye have dwelt בָּהָ֥ר <WH2022> in this mount הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

פְּנ֣וּ ׀ <WH6437> Turn וּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> you and take your journey לָכֶ֗ם וּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> and go הַ֥ר <WH2022> to the mount הָֽאֱמֹרִי֮ <WH567> of the Amorites וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁכֵנָיו֒ <WH7934> and unto all [the places] nigh בָּעֲרָבָ֥ה <WH6160> thereunto in the plain בָהָ֛ר <WH2022> in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֥ה <WH8219> and in the vale וּבַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> and in the south וּבְח֣וֹף <WH2348> side הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> and by the sea אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> to the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> of the Canaanites וְהַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> and unto Lebanon עַד־ <WH5704> far הַנָּהָ֥ר <WH5104> river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> unto the great נְהַר־ <WH5104> the river פְּרָֽת׃ <WH6578> Euphrates

רְאֵ֛ה <WH7200> Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> you go וּרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> in and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> sware יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> unto your fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> and Jacob לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶ֔ם וּלְזַרְעָ֖ם <WH2233> unto them and to their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And I spake אֲלֵכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> unto you at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> I am not אוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> I am not able לְבַדִּ֖י <WH905> you myself alone שְׂאֵ֥ת <WH5375> to bear אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God הִרְבָּ֣ה <WH7235> hath multiplied אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <WH2009> and behold הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> you and behold ye [are] this day כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <WH3556> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> (The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֽוֹתֵכֶ֗ם <WH1> of your fathers יֹסֵ֧ף <WH3254> so many more as עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> and כָּכֶ֖ם אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> make you a thousand פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> times וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> ye [are] and bless אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃
אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> How אֶשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> can I myself alone bear לְבַדִּ֑י <WH905> alone טָרְחֲכֶ֥ם <WH2960> your cumbrance וּמַֽשַּׂאֲכֶ֖ם <WH4853> and your burden וְרִֽיבְכֶֽם׃ <WH7379> adversary

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Take לָ֠כֶם אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH582> men חֲכָמִ֧ים <WH2450> you wise וּנְבֹנִ֛ים <WH995> and understanding וִידֻעִ֖ים <WH3045> and known לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7626> among your tribes וַאֲשִׂימֵ֖ם <WH7760> and I will make בְּרָאשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <WH7218> them rulers

וַֽתַּעֲנ֖וּ <WH6030> And ye answered אֹתִ֑י <WH853> וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> me and said טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> [is] good הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> The thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> which thou hast spoken לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> [for us] to do

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <WH3947> So I took אֶת־ <WH853> רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> the chief שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7626> of your tribes אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men חֲכָמִים֙ <WH2450> wise וִֽידֻעִ֔ים <WH3045> and known וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and made אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> רָאשִׁ֖ים <WH7218> them heads עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> over שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> over you captains אֲלָפִ֜ים <WH505> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains מֵא֗וֹת <WH3967> over hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> and captains חֲמִשִּׁים֙ <WH2572> over fifties וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains עֲשָׂרֹ֔ת <WH6235> over tens וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> and officers לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH7626> among your tribes

וָאֲצַוֶּה֙ <WH6680> And I charged אֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁ֣פְטֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8199> your judges בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> Hear בֵּין־ <WH996> between אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> [the causes] between your brethren וּשְׁפַטְתֶּ֣ם <WH8199> and judge צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteously בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> between [every] man וּבֵין־ <WH996> between אָחִ֖יו <WH251> and his brother וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between גֵּרֽוֹ׃ <WH1616> and the stranger

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַכִּ֨ירוּ <WH5234> Ye shall not respect פָנִ֜ים <WH6440> persons בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> in judgment כַּקָּטֹ֤ן <WH6996> the small כַּגָּדֹל֙ <WH1419> as well as the great תִּשְׁמָע֔וּן <WH8085> [but] ye shall hear לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תָג֙וּרוּ֙ <WH1481> ye shall not be afraid מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> of the face אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> of man כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> for the judgment לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> [is] God's ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְהַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> and the cause אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <WH7185> that is too hard מִכֶּ֔ם <WH4480> is too תַּקְרִב֥וּן <WH7126> for you bring אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me וּשְׁמַעְתִּֽיו׃ <WH8085> [it] unto me and I will hear

וָאֲצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> And I commanded אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> you at that time הַהִ֑וא <WH1931> he אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all the things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> which ye should do

וַנִּסַּ֣ע <WH5265> And when we departed מֵחֹרֵ֗ב <WH2722> from Horeb וַנֵּ֡לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <WH4057> wilderness הַגָּדוֹל֩ <WH1419> all that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֨א <WH3372> and terrible הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> which ye saw דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַ֣ר <WH2022> of the mountain הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֛ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God אֹתָ֑נוּ <WH853> וַנָּבֹ֕א <WH935> us and we came עַ֖ד <WH5704> against קָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> to Kadeshbarnea

וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> And I said אֲלֵכֶ֑ם <WH413> to you בָּאתֶם֙ <WH935> unto you Ye are come עַד־ <WH5704> against הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto the mountain הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> doth give לָֽנוּ׃

רְ֠אֵה <WH7200> Behold נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath set יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> thee go up רֵ֗שׁ <WH3423> [and] possess כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> [it] as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> unto thee fear וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תֵּחָֽת׃ <WH2865> not neither be discouraged

וַתִּקְרְב֣וּן <WH7126> And ye came near אֵלַי֮ <WH413> then כֻּלְּכֶם֒ <WH3605> all וַתֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> unto me every one of you and said נִשְׁלְחָ֤ה <WH7971> We will send אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> before וְיַחְפְּרוּ־ <WH2658> us and they shall search us out לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְיָשִׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> again אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <WH853> דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> us word אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> by what way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> we must go up בָּ֔הּ וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> and into what cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָבֹ֖א <WH935> we shall come אֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּיטַ֥ב <WH3190> be accepted בְּעֵינַ֖י <WH5869> affliction הַדָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> And the saying וָאֶקַּ֤ח <WH3947> and I took מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> at שְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> men אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> of your men אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> of you one לַשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <WH7626> tribe

וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> And they turned וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> and went up הָהָ֔רָה <WH2022> into the mountain וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the valley אֶשְׁכֹּ֑ל <WH812> of Eshcol וַֽיְרַגְּל֖וּ <WH7270> and searched it out אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> And they took בְיָדָם֙ <WH3027> in their hands מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> of the fruit הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיּוֹרִ֖דוּ <WH3381> and brought [it] down אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> to us וַיָּשִׁ֨בוּ <WH7725> again אֹתָ֤נוּ <WH853> דָבָר֙ <WH1697> us word וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said טוֹבָ֣ה <WH2896> [It is] a good הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> doth give לָֽנוּ׃

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> were not אֲבִיתֶ֖ם <WH14> Notwithstanding ye would לַעֲלֹ֑ת <WH5927> not go up וַתַּמְר֕וּ <WH4784> but rebelled אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֥י <WH6310> against the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַתֵּרָגְנ֤וּ <WH7279> And ye murmured בְאָהֳלֵיכֶם֙ <WH168> in your tents וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said בְּשִׂנְאַ֤ת <WH8130> enemy יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Because the LORD אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> הוֹצִיאָ֖נוּ <WH3318> us he hath brought us forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH853> בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites לְהַשְׁמִידֵֽנוּ׃ <WH8045> to destroy

אָנָ֣ה ׀ <WH575> Where אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹלִ֗ים <WH5927> Whither shall we go up אַחֵינוּ֩ <WH251> ? our brethren הֵמַ֨סּוּ <WH4549> have discouraged אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבֵ֜נוּ <WH3824> our heart לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying עַ֣ם <WH5971> The people גָּד֤וֹל <WH1419> [is] greater וָרָם֙ <WH7311> and taller מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> than עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> than we the cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <WH1419> [are] great וּבְצוּרֹ֖ת <WH1219> and walled up בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> to heaven וְגַם־ <WH1571> and besides בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons עֲנָקִ֖ים <WH6062> of the Anakims רָאִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> and moreover we have seen שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it
וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> Then I said אֲלֵכֶ֑ם <WH413> about לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תַֽעַרְצ֥וּן <WH6206> unto you Dread וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִֽירְא֖וּן <WH3372> not neither be afraid מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God הַהֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> which goeth לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> before ה֖וּא <WH1931> will Himself יִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> you he shall fight לָכֶ֑ם כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> for you according to all that he did אִתְּכֶ֛ם <WH854> in בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> for you in Egypt לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> before your eyes

וּבַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> And in the wilderness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where רָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> where thou hast seen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> how נְשָׂאֲךָ֙ <WH5375> bare יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> how that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִשָּׂא־ <WH5375> doth bear אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> thee as a man אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> in all the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> that ye went עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <WH935> until ye came עַד־ <WH5704> until הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this
וּבַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> Yet in this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אֵֽינְכֶם֙ <WH369> did not מַאֲמִינִ֔ם <WH539> ye did not believe בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

הַהֹלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> Who went לִפְנֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6440> before בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way לָת֥וּר <WH8446> you to search you out לָכֶ֛ם מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> a place לַֽחֲנֹֽתְכֶ֑ם <WH2583> to pitch your tents בָּאֵ֣שׁ ׀ <WH784> [in] in fire לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> by night לַרְאֹֽתְכֶם֙ <WH7200> to shew בַּדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> you by what way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> go בָ֔הּ וּבֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and in a cloud יוֹמָֽם׃ <WH3119> by day

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> of your words וַיִּקְצֹ֖ף <WH7107> and was wroth וַיִּשָּׁבַ֥ע <WH7650> and sware לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אִם־ <WH518> lo יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> see אִישׁ֙ <WH376> Surely there shall not one בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these הַדּ֥וֹר <WH1755> generation הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> of this evil הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this אֵ֚ת <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> that good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֔עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> to give לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto your fathers

זֽוּלָתִ֞י <WH2108> Save כָּלֵ֤ב <WH3612> Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּה֙ <WH3312> of Jephunneh ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יִרְאֶ֔נָּה <WH7200> he shall see וְלֽוֹ־ אֶתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> it and to him will I give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that דָּֽרַךְ־ <WH1869> he hath trodden upon בָּ֖הּ וּלְבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and to his children יַ֕עַן <WH3282> on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִלֵּ֖א <WH4390> because he hath wholly אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> followed יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

גַּם־ <WH1571> also בִּי֙ הִתְאַנַּ֣ף <WH599> was angry יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Also the LORD בִּגְלַלְכֶ֖ם <WH1558> with me for your sakes לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying גַּם־ <WH1571> even אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹא־ <WH3808> not תָבֹ֥א <WH935> Thou also shalt not go שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in thither

יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> [But] Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נוּן֙ <WH5126> of Nun הָעֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> which standeth לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before ה֖וּא <WH1931> he יָ֣בֹא <WH935> thee he shall go in שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> חַזֵּ֔ק <WH2388> thither encourage כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֖וּא <WH1931> he יַנְחִלֶ֥נָּה <WH5157> to inherit אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> him for he shall cause Israel

וְטַפְּכֶם֩ <WH2945> Moreover your little ones אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who אֲמַרְתֶּ֜ם <WH559> which ye said לָבַ֣ז <WH957> should be a prey יִהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> become וּ֠בְנֵיכֶם <WH1121> and your children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָדְע֤וּ <WH3045> had no knowledge הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> which in that day ט֣וֹב <WH2896> between good וָרָ֔ע <WH7451> and evil הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> they shall go in שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there וְלָהֶ֣ם אֶתְּנֶ֔נָּה <WH5414> thither and unto them will I give וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and they יִירָשֽׁוּהָ׃ <WH3423> it and they shall possess

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you פְּנ֣וּ <WH6437> But [as for] you turn לָכֶ֑ם וּסְע֥וּ <WH5265> you and take your journey הַמִּדְבָּ֖רָה <WH4057> into the wilderness דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> of the Red

וַֽתַּעֲנ֣וּ ׀ <WH6030> Then ye answered וַתֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me חָטָאנוּ֮ <WH2398> unto me We have sinned לַֽיהוָה֒ <WH3068> against the LORD אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we נַעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> we will go up וְנִלְחַ֔מְנוּ <WH3898> and fight כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֖נוּ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> according to all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וַֽתַּחְגְּר֗וּ <WH2296> us And when ye had girded אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> on every man אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> his weapons מִלְחַמְתּ֔וֹ <WH4421> of war וַתָּהִ֖ינוּ <WH1951> ye were ready לַעֲלֹ֥ת <WH5927> to go up הָהָֽרָה׃ <WH2022> into the hill

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me אֱמֹ֤ר <WH559> unto me Say לָהֶם֙ לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> unto them Go not up וְלֹא־ <WH3808> otherwise תִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וּ <WH3898> neither fight כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵינֶ֖נִּי <WH369> for בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> for I [am] not among וְלֹא֙ <WH3808> otherwise תִּנָּֽגְפ֔וּ <WH5062> you lest ye be smitten לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH341> your enemies

וָאֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> So I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <WH8085> unto you and ye would not hear וַתַּמְרוּ֙ <WH4784> but rebelled אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֣י <WH6310> against the commandment יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתָּזִ֖דוּ <WH2102> presumptuously וַתַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> up הָהָֽרָה׃ <WH2022> into the hill

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> came out הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> And the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> which dwelt בָּהָ֤ר <WH2022> in that mountain הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לִקְרַאתְכֶ֔ם <WH7125> against וַיִּרְדְּפ֣וּ <WH7291> you and chased אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <WH6213> do הַדְּבֹרִ֑ים <WH1682> you as bees וַֽיַּכְּת֥וּ <WH3807> and destroyed אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> בְּשֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> you in Seir עַד־ <WH5704> against חָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> [even] unto Hormah

וַתָּשֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> And ye returned וַתִּבְכּ֖וּ <WH1058> and wept לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> would not hearken יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> but the LORD בְּקֹ֣לְכֶ֔ם <WH6963> to your voice וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הֶאֱזִ֖ין <WH238> nor give ear אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> So ye abode בְקָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> in Kadesh יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many כַּיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> according unto the days אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you יְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3427> that ye abode
